subject: Pedals
description_text:
Dear Simson  Support Team,

I hope this message finds you well.

I am reaching out regarding a sensitivity issue I’ve encountered with my Simson pedals. Recently, I’ve noticed that the pedals are responding too sensitively to input, which is affecting performance and overall usability.

Could you please advise on whether this is a known issue and if there are any recommended adjustments, firmware updates, or potential repairs I should consider? I’d also appreciate any troubleshooting steps you suggest to help resolve the matter.

Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi James Jr. Makris,  Which pedal model did you purchase? If you can provide the specific model, I’ll guide you on how to set the minimum and maximum dead zones accordingly.
